text: Kasaragod Khader Bhai is a 1992 Indian Malayalam-language comedy film directed by Thulasidas and starring Jagadish, Siddique, Ashokan, Zainuddin, Innocent, Mala Aravindan, Alummoodan, Babu Antony, Sunitha, Suchitra and Philomina. The film is a sequel to 1991 film Mimics Parade. In 2010, it spawned a sequel titled Again Kasargod Khader Bhai. ==Plot== The film is about how Kasargod Khader Bhai (Alummoodan) and his son Kasim Bhai (Babu Antony) tries to take revenge on the mimicry artists who send Khader Bhai to jail (This is shown in the prequel). ==Cast== * Jagadish as Unni * Siddique as Sabu * Ashokan as Jimmy * Zainuddin as Nizam * Baiju Santhosh as Manoj * Kalabhavan Ansar as Anwar * Innocent as Fr. Francis Tharakkandam * Mala Aravindan as Mammootty * Sunitha as Sandhya Cheriyan * Suchitra as Latha * Saikumar as Sreenivasa Menon * Mahesh as Jayan * K. B. Ganesh Kumar * Abi * Idavela Babu * Shankaradi as Pachalam Pappachan * Philomina as Thandamma * Babu Antony as Kasim Bhai (Voice Dubbing by Prof. Aliyar) * Alummoodan as Kasargod Khader Bhai * Mohanraj as Khader Bhai's right hand * Sivaji as Frederik Cherian, Sandhya's brother * Sadiq as Stephen Cherian, Sandhya's brother * Prathapachandran as Cherian, Sandhya's father * Kanakalatha as Latha's mother ==Soundtrack== Music: Johnson, Lyrics: Bichu Thirumala. * Neelakkurkkan - Jolly Abraham, Krishnachandran, Sujatha Mohan, Johnson, C. O. title: Kasarkode Khaderbai
